content:
Ctrl-Enter or Ctrl-Return will send it.

To get your button back try right-clicking where it should be and then choose Customise... That will bring up a screen showing all the buttons you can have and you can drag out the ones you want and drag away those you don't.
creator: ThePillenwerfer

content: Are you talking of messages in your trash/junk folder that are not flagged as junk. That is generally mail your provider considers junk places in the relevant folder but Thunderbird does not see it as junk.
creator: MattAuSupport

content: delete the file foldertree.json from your profile folder with Thunderbird closed.
creator: MattAuSupport

content:
Connections to Hotmail should be managed using oauth, not a password. You can delete the oauth token for the account in the password manager to force a full reauthentication, or wait until Microsoft decides the existing authorization requires renewal and do it then.

You might want to check your SMTP settings to ensure he server name is smtp.office365.com and the authentication method is oauth. It sounds like it may not be so, ass there is a password in the password manager for SMTP
creator: MattAuSupport

content:
just clearing the password (there were 2 outlook ones, and an office 360 one) in the password manager worked. No new password to enter, weirdly. Thanks.

Frankly, Thunderbird ergonomics and documentation feel... by nerds for nerds. I can't put that on my family's PCs since I can't get it to work for myself.
creator: oonlan

content:
Windows ha cambiato molte volte il programma pre-installato per la posta elettronica. Dipende da quale hai usato.

Andando in Tasto menu > Strumenti > Importa trovi lo strumento di importazione che però supporta psolo Outlook tra i client Microsoft

Se riesci ad identificare con precisione quale programma hai usato e in che formato ha salvato la posta, si possono cercare altre soluzioni.
creator: @next

content: Grazie per la risposta, il programma di posta è Windows Mail su Windows 10 Pro Sistema operativo a 64 bit, processore basato su x64 Posta con estensione .eml che sto vedendo che è la stessa estensione di Outlook grazie
creator: musicdentro

content: Se sono file .eml ti basta trascinarli in una cartella di Thunderbird a gruppi di un centinaio alla volta.
creator: @next

content:
Heeft u uw computer al een keer herstart?

Als dat niet werkt ga dan naar je profielmap, https://support.mozilla.org/nl/kb/profielen-waar-thunderbird-gebruikersgegevens-bewaart, en verwijder het bestand parent.lock
creator: Mad_Maks

content: Het spijt me, ik kan nergens het bestand op de "c: schijf" parent.lock vinden. Tevens de computer diverse keren herstart
creator: dommerholt_eddi

content: Talk to your email provider about password reset options. Note, there is no such thing as a Thunderbird email account. Thunderbird is an application run on your device, so it does not provide email addresses, nor the service to transmit emails. But Thunderbird can be used with your existing email address and service provider to send, receive, sort and search your email messages.
creator: christ1
